text: There was a man who hated a slut because she occasionally caused some damage to her. After trying so hard, he finally got her. In an effort to avenge her, he tied a spike soaked in oil to her tail and set it on fire. But a god led the fox to the fields that that man was growing. It was the time when the product was ready to be harvested. The farmer, following the fox, watched, weeping, as she passed through her fields, burning all her produce. Try to be forgiving, for the evil we generate returns against us.
title: La zorra y el labrador
author: nan Esopo
